column8: In the words of the late Robert Hughes 'MODernity'.  A prodigious engine a perfect position, eccentric chainrings, eccentric sense of humour and an eccentric but entirely authentic line in mumble.  Show your appreciation, wear our Wiggins & Roundel t-shirt.
